name: Stamps
description:
In this puzzle game, your task is to recreate the title stamps using a variety of mechanics.  

If you like the demo please consider purchasing the full game.

The full game has 50 levels, you will spend your time thinking about solving them and relaxing at the same time!

Controls:
use a colored shape: touch/click on it or press A (for shape on the left), W (for shape from above), D (for shape on the right), S (for shape from below)

rotate shapes:  touch / click the rotate button or press Q (to rotate right), E (to rotate left); only possible when the rotation button is visible

color a colorless shape: drag and drop the paint into a colorless shape; only possible when the paint is visible

undo: touch/click the undo button or press U
